thread.title: Fashion guru Trinny Woodall reveals more than a style tip as she flashes her breast during a Facebook video blog
thread.title_full: Fashion guru Trinny Woodall reveals more than a style tip as she flashes her breast during a Facebook video blog

author: esanger
title: Fashion guru Trinny Woodall reveals more than a style tip as she flashes her breast during a Facebook video blog
text:
TV Magazine WHAT NOT TO SHARE Fashion guru Trinny Woodall reveals more than a style tip as she flashes her breast during a Facebook video blog 
Bra-less clothes and beauty presenter didn't seem to notice her 'boob' during the clip by Neil Syson and Carri-Ann Taylor 21st February 2017, 10:30 pm Style guru Trinny Woodall gave viewers more of a fashion tip than they bargained for – when she gave them a quick flash! 
The 53-year-old clothes and beauty presenter was making a video blog about gym wear when she suffered the embarrassing wardrobe malfunction. YouTube 4 Fashion guru Trinny Woodall tugs at her gym top to demonstrate how people often leave gym tops outside leggings during a workout 
Bra-less Trinny was eagerly explaining to 10,000 Facebook followers how women looked better with tops inside the leggings waistbands. 
To demonstrate, she untucked the slinky grey number by hip brand Sweaty Betty and accidentally revealed her right boob – though she didn’t seem to notice. YouTube 4 Peek-a-boob … she accidentally flashes her right breast but appears not to notice during the video blog 
The broadcast from the bathroom of her west London home had yesterday been viewed by around 120,000 times. Related stories Can YOU spot the Oscar on the red carpet in under five seconds? shoe gotta be kidding Are you a 'wannabe chav' or a 'gym rat'? What the brand of your trainers says about you Doctor Noo-Noo A doctor known as the 'vagina whisperer' holds showcase for women who want to make their genitals sexier Passion for fashion London Fashion Week has kicked off in style - here's everything you need to know NEW YORK FASHION CHEEK Runway lingerie model goes from chic to cheek as she flashes bum at NYFW LIVING LARGE Oscar invites and yacht parties in Cannes... the fabulous life of Steven Spielberg’s model daughter Destry SMOOTH CRIMINAL 'Hot felon' Jeremy Meeks makes New York Fashion Week debut with Madonna and Kylie Jenner in the audience Good vibrations Beauty blogger Chloe Morello uses a vibrator to apply her makeup... with surprising results DEO BELIEVE IT Three surprising ways you can use deodorant... that don't involve your armpits turn back time Want to look ten years younger without surgery? These ten tips from a top doc, hair stylist and make-up experts will do just that Disco fever Braless models rock 70's perms as they storm New York Fashion Week catwalk in see-through lace gowns PRETTY AMAZING Remember the ten-year-old model dubbed the 'prettiest girl in the world'? Here's what she looks like now 
Trinny, who shot to fame with BBC co-presenter Susannah Constantine on What Not to Wear in 2001, once promoted the programme by placing two fried eggs over her chest assets. 
But when they hosted a 2008 ITV show The Great British Body, just 100 people answered their call to gather naked on the Sussex Downs. YouTube 4 Trinny continues with the clip, advising women on how best to wear gym tops during a workout 
Trinny divorced musician turned investor hubby Johnny Eliachaoff when he went bankrupt in 2009, shortly before he committed suicide. Rex Features Trinny shot to fame with BBC co-presenter Susannah Constantine on What Not to Wear in 2001 Trinny Woodall has bizarre conversation about swallowing phlegm on This Morning 
And yesterday This Morning viewers speculated the ex-What Not to Wear star was drunk after bizarre behaviour in which she was caught on her phone live on air and spoke about swallowing phlegm.
